alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 2:14PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nueces, west central San Patricio, northeastern Jim Wells and south central Live Oak Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 214 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westdale, or 11 miles southwest of Mathis, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Grove, Lake City, San Patricio, Sandia, Lagarto, Alfred-South La Paloma, Alfred, Westdale and Pernitas Point. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 656 and 658. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak
